testcase.classname: Identify all elements on form and submit
testcase.name: Complete the registration form
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome browser should be opened.......................................passed When Zephyrcodecontest website is launched..................................passed And the form is submitted with all fields filled............................passed Then Successfully submitted message should be shown.........................passed

testcase.classname: Identify all elements on form and submit
testcase.name: Open zephyrcodecontest.com website and fill multiple values
